title: Is Kayn leaving the map intentional?
body: Hey, I've seen lots of vids of people leaving the map with Kayn's E, do you know if this is a bug or does Riot want this to be part of his kit? It looks super fun but broken AF.

replies.body: Yeah its intentional. With Kayn's E, he has unlimited potential, whether to escape, to gank or counterattack, but this skill is broken AF

I can pretty much assure everyone this is a bug and *shouldn't* make it to live. No champion should be able to leave the map like that for any period of time, it's just too unbalanced and unpredictable. Riot is likely working on a solution as we speak, though it *might* cause a delay to Kayn's release depending on how long it takes them.
It should be a bug moving outside the map is broken and should not be something that you can do in League
It seems like a bug, he's still not properly released, most champions have bugs like this that are found during PBE.
There is a 1250 warning range when he is in walls to enemies, other than that he is invisible to everything.
